name: puzzleImage
label: Puzzle image
description: Image that the tiles should be cut from.

name: tilesHorizontal
label: Number of puzzle tiles horizontally
description: How many puzzle tiles should the jigsaw puzzle have horizontally.

name: tilesVertical
label: Number of puzzle tiles vertically
description: How many puzzle tiles should the jigsaw puzzle have vertically.

name: sound
label: Sound settings
description: These options will let you set sound related options.

fields.name: autoplayBackgroundMusic
fields.label: Autoplay background music
fields.description: Try to autoplay background music. May not be possible depending on the browser's policy.

fields.name: dropPuzzleTile
fields.label: Drop puzzle tile
fields.description: Optional sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped.

fields.name: matchPuzzleTile
fields.label: Drop puzzle tile correctly
fields.description: Optional sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped in the correct spot.

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.name: timeLimit
fields.label: Time limit
fields.description: Set an optional time limit in seconds.

fields.name: timeAffordances
fields.label: Time to affordances
fields.description: Set an optional time limit in seconds until the user is shown where one of the tiles needs to go.

fields.name: showBackground
fields.label: Show faint background
fields.description: Show faint background to indicate where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.name: sortingSpace
fields.label: Sorting space
fields.description: Set how much space in percent should be attached next to the jigsaw puzzle for sorting the tiles.
